test_name: Invalid Case 2 - Too many images and invalid province
description: Report with too many images and invalid province name

user_input.description: Lost cat in my neighborhood. Gray with white spots. Very friendly.

expected_behavior: Should raise ValidationError due to too many images (6 > 5) and invalid province
validation_errors: Province must be one of: San José, Alajuela, Cartago, Heredia, Guanacaste, Puntarenas, Limón
notes: Tests multiple validation rules simultaneously. Ensures system handles compound validation errors gracefully.
